string.text: Pipe in Kamaz
While the factory's still irradiated, I'm gonna leave a stash with medical supplies nearby. I'm sick of carrying it around already.
Safe
This guy gave me the coords to his stash at Yantar for helping him hunt mutants. Whether I'll even get there, though... that's a whole different story.
Fuse box at fence
After a catch like that, I might as well stash some of it. There's a nice little place nearby where I think I'll drop it off.
Switchboard room
On the way to the factory, there's a switchboard room. I doubt anyone is gonna risk their ass and go there while Yantar's still covered by psy-emissions.
Stump on hill
I saw this zombie digging in a rotten stump a moment ago. Looks like it's not brain-dead just yet! Once our boys leave, I'll see what the poor fella's got there.
Hidden stash

A pal of mine on contract for the scientists sent off a distress signal. He hasn't been on the air for days now. Looks I'll be cleaning out his stuff on my next visit to Yantar, 'cause it's a shame letting it go to waste.
Backpack on helicopter
The paths to the helicopter are heavily flooded... and not just with water, but with mutants. I don't even know whether I should even go back to my stash around there...
Rusty pipe
Found a good place for hiding my well-earned pickings from the eggheads. I'll be filling up this stash while they don't suspect anything.
Hatch
I found a fat stash under this heavy old hatch. Gonna return once I leave my backpack â€” walking with all that loot on your back and a gun in your hands ain't the wisest decision.
Log at garages
There's a ton of space in a log by the three garages, great place for my loot. I'll leave some of my stuff there for a while.
Panel under rubble
I dug up a ton of useful things while finding a way out of the lab. Too bad I can't carry it all, so I'll leave some of it here. Might come back for it later.
Case in toilet
There's a case in the toilet by the door. One of the stalkers who went down here made a cache with supplies. You might just find something useful there.
